p: The treated groups with plant extracts in 3 doses were significantly different with hepatotoxic group in decreasing SGOT and SGPT activities. Meanwhile, the administration of P. odoratissimus extracts with doses of 600 and 900 mg/kg BW was not significantly different with the healthy control group in decreasing SGOT activities in serum but only a dose of 900 mg/kg BW was not significantly different with the healthy control group in decreasing SGPT activity.
